full_summary:
# THS Computer, Applications Support, Senior – Sharepoint Analyst

## Title
THS Computer, Applications Support, Senior – Sharepoint Analyst

## Reference Number
CB-7443-39154357

## Solicitation Number
W6952-24-062

## Publication Date
2023-07-21

## Tender Closing Date
2023-07-25 14:00:00

## Tender Status
The tender has expired.

## Request for Proposal
The Department of National Defence (DND)/Digital Transformation Office (DTO) is seeking a qualified supplier to provide Temporary Help Services (THS) for Computer Services under Standing Arrangement (SA) EN578-172870.

## Description of Requirement
The proposed contract is for a period of 48 weeks, commencing on August 21, 2023. The successful bidder will provide technical services under the THS Method of Supply, which is subject to quarterly refresh cycles.

## Requirements
* Level of Security Requirement: Reliability
* Estimated Level of Effort: 7.5 hours/day – 37.5h/week
* Number of Contracts: One contract to be awarded

## Location of Work
* Region: National Capital Region (NCR)
* Specific Location: National Defence Headquarters, 285 Coventry Dr. Ottawa Ontario

## Contact Information
* Liam O'Toole, Contracting Authority
	+ Phone: (613) 794-8299
	+ Email: [liam.o’toole@forces.gc.ca](mailto:liam.o'toole@forces.gc.ca)
	+ Address: 285 Coventry Dr. Ottawa Ontario
	+ Postal Code: K1K 3X6
	+ Country: Canada

## Request for Proposal Documents
Request for Proposal (RFP) documents will be e-mailed directly to the qualified suppliers who have been invited to bid on this requirement. Proposals are to be submitted in accordance with the instructions outlined in the RFP documents. The RFP documents are not available on the Government Electronic Tendering System.

Note: I kept the most important information the same, made some adjustments to the formatting, and rephrased the text to make it more professional and concise. I also added a title and a few headings to make the document more readable. Let me know if you need any further adjustments!
